Comment: This response provides a comprehensive and insightful analysis of the significance of Jesus' self-identification as the "Son of Man" within a Christian worldview. It effectively discusses the theological, biblical, messianic, and eschatological aspects of this title, showcasing a deep understanding of its implications for faith. The response effectively connects the title to Jesus' dual nature as fully human and fully divine, highlighting the Messianic role and the connection to humanity. The content is well-supported with references to Scripture and theological concepts. Great job!
